price: (8) And they resented them not except because they believed in Allāh, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā naqamū min'hum illā an yu'minū bil-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
